# Getting here

The workshop takes place in Durham's historic city centre, at a 20 minutes walking distance from the train station. Sessions will be held in Tristram room at St. John's college:
![](images/location.png){width="100%"}

Durham can be reached by train in three hours from London, two hours from Manchester, and less than two hours from Edinburgh. The nearest airport is Newcastle Airport, which can be reached by public transport from Durham in one hour. Participants coming by car should contact us so we can arrange parking spaces with Durham University.
